Summary: Seen object in the night sky that had no reasonable explanation.
divs: sighting detailsin pickup travelling to our farm backfield. there was a quarter moon to the left. on the right side as i looked out of window, my husband was driving, i thought i seen another quarter moon. it changed shape to a veritable shape with 4 to 6 individual lights. it came down in a blink of the eye and looked like dull gray disc shape with a white\blue color lights. it was stationary above us. my husband got out of the truck and watched. i panicked and begged my husband to get us out of there. as we left the object followed us above the trees then disappeared. i am not sure of the length of time this event endured. my husband has always been very reluctant to speak of that night. we both were of sound mind during that occurrence. i will never forget that date and time and it will go to the graveyard with me.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hughesville
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
